original_text: Thinking he was in their company, they traveled on for a day. Then they began looking for him among their relatives and friends.
korean_text: 동행 중에 있는 줄로 생각하고 하룻길을 간 후 친족과 아는 자 중에서 찾되

sentences.original_text: Thinking he was in their company
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기들과 함께 있는 줄 생각하여

sentences.original_text: they traveled on for a day
Then they began looking for him
